alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 12:16AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Elevated Surf Today and Wednesday Along The West Coast From the Bering Strait To The Yukon Delta... A strong storm will move to the West Coast of Alaska today and into the Interior on Wednesday. South winds of 25 to 40 mph are expected along the West Coast today, diminishing tonight and Wednesday. These strong winds will cause elevated surf from the Bering Strait to the Yukon Delta through Wednesday, with high surf possible along south facing shores such as at Nome, Golovin and in the Bering Strait. Storm surges of 3 feet above normal high tides are possible into Wednesday.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta
